INSERT INTO STM3003 ( LOG_TIME , LOG_STATE , USR_ID , LIC_GRP_ID , USR_PW , USR_NM , EMAIL , TELNO , DEPT_ID , ETC , WK_ST_TM , WK_ED_TM , BK_ST_TM , BK_ED_TM , PW_FAIL_CNT , BLOCK , USR_IMG_ID , USE_CD , USR_POSITION_CD , USR_DUTY_CD , REQ_MAIN_COLOR , REQ_FONT_COLOR , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP , REC_LOGIN_DTM , PW_MODIFY_DTM ) SELECT SYSDATE AS LOG_TIME , #logState# AS LOG_STATE , USR_ID , LIC_GRP_ID , USR_PW , USR_NM , EMAIL , TELNO , DEPT_ID , ETC , WK_ST_TM , WK_ED_TM , BK_ST_TM , BK_ED_TM , PW_FAIL_CNT , BLOCK , USR_IMG_ID , USE_CD , USR_POSITION_CD , USR_DUTY_CD , REQ_MAIN_COLOR , REQ_FONT_COLOR , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP , REC_LOGIN_DTM
, null AS PW_MODIFY_DTM
, REG_DTM AS PW_MODIFY_DTM
, MODIFY_DTM AS PW_MODIFY_DTM
FROM STM3000 WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND USR_ID = #usrId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT NVL((TO_DATE( TO_CHAR( ADD_MONTHS(T.PW_MODIFY_DTM, 6),'YYYY-MM-DD' ), 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) - TRUNC(SYSDATE)) , 100) FROM ( SELECT MAX(A.PW_MODIFY_DTM) AS PW_MODIFY_DTM FROM STM3003 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PW_MODIFY_DTM IS NOT NULL AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USR_ID = #usrId# ) T

SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_PW_YN FROM STM3003 A WHERE 1=1 AND ( A.LOG_STATE = 'I' OR A.LOG_STATE = 'U' ) AND A.LOG_TIME BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12) AND SYSDATE
AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND A.USR_ID = #usrId# AND A.USR_PW = #usrPw#

SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(pw_modify_dtm), 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI') AS recentPwd FROM STM3003 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LOG_STATE = 'U'
AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND A.USR_ID = #usrId#
